author: vejou

game.author: theidealist101
game.name: stellua
game.short_description: Work in Progress. A sandbox game about exploring alien planets and building starships.
game.title: Stellua

long_description:
Adds quartz colored glass to Stellua. Not tinted visibly - the outline is changed. Requires some Stellua modules, possibly more than listed in dependencies.

Make quartz tinted glass by surrounding normal glass with versions of quartz. Works with all five types and with glass itself, creating a blue version.

Texture files also include XCF files that you can tint glass with yourself by modifying. These are the same as the media license, CC-BY-SA 3.0, though technically you can remake them under CC0 if you get the original texture from Minetest Game.
name: quartz_glass_stl
short_description: Adds quartz-glass combinations for colored glass blocks
title: Quartz Glass for Stellua
